data.text: Oluyimba lwa Sulemaani olusinga ennyimba zonna.
Ntegeeza ggwe gwe njagala, gy’oliisiza ekisibo kyo,
Bw’oba nga tomanyi, ggwe omukyala asinga bonna obulungi,
Amatama go galabika bulungi ng’oyambadde ebikomo eby’oku matu,
Kabaka bwe yali ng’atudde ku mmeeza ye,

Muganzi wange ali ng’ensawo eya kaloosa aka mooli1:13 Mooli kaloosa kalungi nnyo akakolebwa okuva mu balusamu nga kasangibwa mu Esiyopya, ne mu Buyindi, ne mu nsi za Buwalabu. Mooli yakozesebwanga ng’obuwoowo mu biseera ebyo gye ndi,
Muganzi wange ali ng’ekiganda eky’ebimuli ebya kofera1:14 Kofera kimuli ky’akaloosa kalungi, era kikolebwamu obuwoowo.
